item.description:
Join your fellow Pub Crawlers on our 4th Annual Pub Crawl on Boylston Street in Boston!

Here's the schedule:

2:00 p.m. - Mass Ave Tavern (we will be to the right of the bar)
3:00 p.m. - Dillon's (955 Boylston St)
4:00 p.m. - Cactus Club (939 Boylston St)
5:00 p.m. - McGreevy's (911 Boylston St; back bar on main floor)
6:00 p.m. - Pour House (907 Boylston St)
7:00 p.m. - Lir (903 Boylston St; downstairs bar)
8:00 p.m. - Whiskey Smokehouse (885 Boylston St)

Be sure to check back for more details.
item.name: 4th Annual Boylston Street Pub Crawl
